item.title: [WAW1][Cooling System] - Rack WAW0106A05B maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 19, 2026, 07:00 - 15:00 UTC

Dec 9, 03:44 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 19/02/2026 07:00 UTC

Thank you for your understanding.
